alert.note: Alert for Pickens (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:59PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Pickens County through 530 PM CDT... At 459 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gordo, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Aliceville, Gordo, Reform, Carrollton, Benevola, Johnston Lake, Owens, Kirk, Dillburg, Pioneer, North Pickens Airport and McShan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
